sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { BuildingOfficeIcon, EyeIcon, EyeSlashIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import LoadingSpinner from '../../components/common/LoadingSpinner'; const LoginPage = () => { const { login, loading, error } = useAuth(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', password: '', }); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await login(formData.email, formData.password); }; return (
{/* Left side - Login Form */}
AFMS

Sign in to your account

Or{' '} create a new account

{error && (
{error}
)}
Forgot your password?
Or continue with
{/* Right side - Feature Showcase */}

Advanced Finance Management System

Streamline your financial operations with AI-powered document processing, automated transaction classification, and comprehensive reporting.

OCR & AI Document Processing
Multi-Currency Support
Enterprise-Grade Security
Comprehensive Financial Reports
); }; export default LoginPage;
